name: scenically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has or is related to beautiful natural features: The most beautiful beaches are located between scenically dramatic rocky headlands. The planning rules are designed to restrict the growth of new housing in scenically attractive areas. Scenically, this is not as immediately stunning as some of the other islands.
More examplesFewer examplesCampaigners argue that the new pipeline could damage the river both scenically and environmentally.This is definitely one of the most scenically beautiful beaches on the island.The Norwegian fjords were just as scenically stunning as we'd expected.
